Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Milestones.Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Relates to the eligibility criteria for the excelsior jobs program act
Summary: Requires a business entity in violation of worker protection or environmental laws and regulations to surrender all previous state subsidies issued to such business entity.
LawCode: Amd ยง353, Ec Dev L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law, in relation to the eligibility criteria for the excelsior jobs program act
